content.text: "Hey," Kasha clips suddenly. "You've got an idea of where we're goin', right?" She doesn't turn around to look at either of you, but you can hear Kozlov scoff.
"We're lettin' our rookie pick," he calls, and she whips her head around and gives him a disgruntled look.
She pauses and is quiet for a long moment, then jabs a finger at him. "That's stupid."
